title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, December 20, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of the author Elizabeth Benedict (1954). Her most recent book is “Me, My Hair and I: 27 Women Untangle an Obsession.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
